name: Rfid-sport-timer-solutions
tagline: You can suppose to start with a creating Racing solution application with RFID technology support using our support
body:
A typical RFID system consists of a reader, and antenna and a transponder.

RFID Systems use specially-designed lightweight tags that can be read up to 200 mph, need no charging, are disposable and cost just a few dollars per competitor. Perfect for any scoring and timing application you may have.

The ULTRA is the latest technology in the RFID world and is able to read both disposable and re-usable tags, making it extremely versatile catering for smaller club events through to the largest fun runs.

ULTRA has many benefits of which are listed below.

available in 4 or 8 port configurations,
low profile antenna mats, perfect for running and cycling,
open source UHF tags,
Disposable UHF tags or re-usable ULTRATAG.
Alongside the race timing systems we also are able to offer a range of great accessories that will give your event the professional touch.

Race Clocks
tag encoders / readers
low profile UHF antenna mats
UHF side antennas
Wide range of tags, reusable (UHF and LF) and disposable UHF.
Contact for expert information in determining your hardware requirements, or for a demonstration of RFID Race Timing Systems. Please feel free to send an Email on ptlchetan@gmail.com"
